---
name: GitHub MCP Demo
description: This prompt is used to demonstrate the capabilities of GitHub MCP for automating tasks and interacting with GitHub repositories.
---

Puedes decirme qué Issues tengo pendientes en este repositorio y luego crear un nuevo issue con el título "GitHub MCP Demo Issue" y la descripción "This issue was created using GitHub MCP to demonstrate its capabilities."? Usa el mcp server de github para ello, no Github CLI.
